quarks.runtime.jmxcontrol

Class JMXControlService

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.runtime.jmxcontrol.JMXControlService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlService

    public class JMXControlService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControlService
    Control service that registers control objects as MBeans in a JMX server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JMXControlService(java.lang.String domain, java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> additionalKeys)
      JMX control service using the platform MBean server.

      • registerControl

        public <T> java.lang.String registerControl(java.lang.String type,
                                            java.lang.String id,
                                            java.lang.String alias,
                                            java.lang.Class<T> controlInterface,
                                            T control)
        Register a control object as an MBean. Register a control server MBean for an oplet. The MBean is registered within the domain returned by getDomain() and an `ObjectName` with these keys:
        • type
          • type
        • interface
          • controlInterface.getName()
        • id
          • type
        • alias
          • alias
        Specified by:
        registerControl in interface ControlService
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the control object.
        id - Unique identifier for the control object.
        alias - Alias for the control object. Expected to be unique within the context of type.
        controlInterface - Public interface for the control object.
        control - The control bean
        Returns:
        unique identifier that can be used to unregister an control mbean.
